annotations.note: Registered scripts will only be applied to newly opened message compose tabs. To apply the script to already open message compose tabs, manually inject your script by calling $(ref:scripting.executeScript) for each of the open <var>messageCompose</var> tabs.

annotations.hint: There is a known issue in the logging mechanism of compose scripts: All entries logged to the console appear twice.

annotations.note: Registered scripts will only be applied to newly opened messages. To apply the script to already open messages, manually inject your script by calling $(ref:scripting.executeScript) for each of the open <var>messageDisplay</var> tabs.

annotations.hint: There is a known issue in the logging mechanism of message display scripts: All entries logged to the console appear twice.
